name: College Craft
description:
Welcome to the beautiful town whose inhabitants are the masters of crafting. College of crafts - a new educational institution, opened in this town. You have to take on the role of manager, and equip a new college at your discretion. Create new classrooms, equip them at will, make extensions and other premises on the territory of the institution, place the students as a real manager.

Play the usual survival mode with crafting, go on a journey in search of adventure in the game world, explore mines and caves, build your home, create weapons and armor or new blocks!

Features:
- A new college and a campus for students.
- Generate a card with complete freedom of action.
- Possibility to place characters according to your desire.
- Dynamically changing world (different biomes).
- Construction and development of the city with residents.
- Two game modes: survival (blocks, craft) and creativity.
- External design of jewelry (lamps, flowers, gardens, pools, benches).
- A large set of 3D models of interior and decoration (furniture, appliances, etc.).
